releases.description: Coming Soon. The Trees, Highlands and Portals Update. Coming Soon.

description: Changed the color of foliages. Added the aether portal.
Warning: You might need structure voids to help the water stay in place.

releases.description: Added the aether and its highlands. Updated the Aether Highlands to make it look more like the mod. Command: /execute at aether:aether run to username 1 100 0.
